snippet: A southwest Missouri man accused of plotting to shoot up a theater during the new movie “Twilight: Breaking Dawn Part 2” was charged on Friday after his mother contacted the police.
abstract: Blaec Lammers, southwest Missouri man accused of plotting to shoot up a theater during movie Twilight: Breaking Dawn Part 2, is charged with first degree assault, making a terroristic threat and armed criminal action after his mother contacts police; she tells them she was worried because her son had bought weapons similar to those used in fatal Colorado theater shooting in July.
lead_paragraph: A southwest Missouri man accused of plotting to shoot up a theater during the new movie “Twilight: Breaking Dawn Part 2” was charged on Friday after his mother contacted the police.

headline.main: Missouri: Man Is Accused in Theater Shooting Plot
headline.print_headline: Missouri Man Is Accused In Theater Shooting Plot
